channel.title: Xfire?
channel.description:
Its for anyone who plays PC games or whatever
i.e. Halo PC, Half Life2, Counter Strike, etc.
It's meant for people with computer to be able to message people w/o being bumped out of game. me and billygotshot fouth over Halo PC and someone messaged me i sent them a message through the game w/o having to minimize or exit the game! :( though he beat me.
[url=http://xfire.com]xfire.com[/url]
My Xfire: Salsgiver
But my name when you talk to me isnt Salsgiver more like
[XDZ]N1ck~Recruiter~
but thats besides the point. if you have a game and are sick of being bumped out of in game by aim or msn. xfire is a good choice!

item.title: Xfire?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:8, topic:164078”]I have known about xfire for a long time but i never really used it lol. anyways yes i did beat him :P…

Next time we play you host the game though.[/quote]
o_0 these are lies l0l. i don’t lag

Read full topic

item.title: Xfire?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

I have known about xfire for a long time but i never really used it lol. anyways yes i did beat him :P…

Next time we play you host the game though.

Read full topic

item.title: Xfire?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Swordskid61:

i’ve had xfire for about a year now. im just letting people who still HAVE aim, msn, etc. to get this.!

Haha. If I ever forget to log off my trillian while im logged in on xfire, my friend IMs me saying “Boom, you died”.
Which kicks me out of the game and/or lags me out. It’s pretty funny if you’re looking in from the outside, but it sucks like hell when you’re the one playing and getting kicked out

Read full topic

item.title: Xfire?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

iceburster:

Counter-Strike: Source kicks ass.

That’s a laugh, more people play CS: 1.6 than CZ and Source combined. Besides, it’s easier to get headshots in source than in 1.6. I’d own your ass in 1.6.

Read full topic

item.title: Xfire?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:4, topic:164078”]You for serious?

I’ve had xfire for at least 5 years now… How have you gone so long playing games and not had an in-game messaging client!!?
Get out of the stone age man![/quote]
i’ve had xfire for about a year now. im just letting people who still HAVE aim, msn, etc. to get this.!

Read full topic
